nodes.bodyText: This is a fine change but i kind of lean towards an empty default .... WDYT?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,6 +26,8 @@ helpPath=/help
 # Use /tool for the new dispatcher
 toolPath=/portal/tool
 
+# Default favicon
+portal.favicon.url=/library/icon/favicon.ico

nodes.bodyText:
I did test that it works if there's no default, but I feel like for the nightlies we'll want to set a default. I also changed the default to the new jewel icon. I think it looks better than having the standard "non-icon" and it also provides a little marketing for schools that don't want to change it.
The default for Canvas is the Instructure icon and even though there is a UI to change it, I spot checked a few schools and only half of the ones I looked at actually did change it.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -26,6 +26,8 @@ helpPath=/help
 # Use /tool for the new dispatcher
 toolPath=/portal/tool
 
+# Default favicon
+portal.favicon.url=/library/icon/favicon.ico
